greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Irregular triangle read by rows in which row n lists the differences between consecutive divisors of n.
comment: The sum of row n gives A000027(n-1). The product of row n gives A057449(n). Row n has length A032741(n). The final term of row n is A060681(n). It appears that the first term of row n is A057237(n).
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 2..1600, flattened
Omar E. Pol, Illustration of divisors of n
xref: Cf. A060682 (distinct terms per row), A060680 (row minima), A060681 (row maxima).
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Aug 31 2011
